question: Who was the first Tirthankara in Jainism?
explanation: Lord Rishabhdev was the first Tirthankara of Jainism. He was born at Ayodhya in the Ikshwaku Kula or clan. In Hinduism he is known to be an avatara or incarnation of Vishnu. The name of Rishabhâ€™s parents has been mentioned in the Bhagvata Purana.
